original_text: And caused me to pass by them round about: and, behold, there were very many in the open valley; and, lo, they were very dry.
korean_text: 나를 그 뼈 사방으로 지나가게 하시기로 본즉 그 골짜기 지면에 뼈가 심히 많고 아주 말랐더라

sentences.original_text: And caused me to pass by them round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 그들 주위로 지나가게 했다

sentences.original_text: there were very many in the open valley
sentences.korean_translation: 열린 골짜기에 매우 많은 뼈들이 있었다
